This movie is the least hateful that I could imagine. You would probably enjoy it. The only one throwing insults, and lies for that matter, is you. My purpose here is to share the truth, that you obviously do not know. Your comments on this, and the previous torrent, show your ignorance, penchant for lies, and your bias toward such liars. hey hosman, you will definitely love this awesome movie, please share it, thanks.

as for "mac the ripper", he has thrown only insults and lies, in this, and the previous torrent; showing his extreme lack of concern for anyone who isn't of Jewish bias.

The truth is not "nazi", "anti-Semitic", "hateful", "cockinthemouth", nor does it assume that Hitler was a nice guy, or that no war-crimes were committed at Auschwitz, which he can't even spell, nor does it say that all Jews are pedophile rapists, as is Roman Polanski, who wasn't even allowed to make aliyah to israel, because of his reputation, even though all their prime ministers and presidents have been war-criminals and terrorists!

 So what does he demand? Censorship, because the truth is not with him, while he hypocritically pretends to kill people like a Templar knight, and mercenary soldier, in his fantasy video game world, claiming to be righteous.

It brings me great despair, to realize the hypocrisy and gullibility of human beings, and how they would rather lie to excuse their iniquity, than do the right thing, and accept the truth, for starters.
